key_factors.desire_invest_retirement: your desire to invest for your retirement
key_factors.ongoing_service_advice: the ongoing service and advice that you want
key_factors.sjp_investment_approach: the St. James's Place Investment Management Approach
key_factors.flexibility_benefits: the flexibility required when taking benefits

salary_sacrifice.description:
Your employer has confirmed that pension contributions can be made via salary sacrifice, but this doesn't include the employer's national insurance saving. The benefits of paying pension contributions via salary sacrifice are:

You will pay less income tax on your earnings.
You will pay less national insurance on your earnings. Your employer saves on national insurance.

fund_selection.overall_equity_content: The overall equity content of the allocation following the transfer 68.37%, which is within the 80% threshold for a medium risk portfolio.

investment_timeframe: 5 to 15 years because your selected retirement age is 65.
